us.phonetic: /n. əˈrɪθmətɪk; adj. ˌærɪθˈmɛtɪk/, (n. ə rith′mə tik; adj. ar′ith met′ik)

example.eg: I'm good at doing arithmetic in my head.

us.phonetic: /n. əˈrɪθmətɪk; adj. ˌærɪθˈmɛtɪk/, (n. ə rith′mə tik; adj. ar′ith met′ik)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 二进制运算, 二进制计数法

dsense.name: reading, writing, and arithmetic
dsense.guideword: (basic skills: literacy, numeracy) (即阅读、写作和算术)

example.eg: When you go to primary school, you have to focus on reading, writing, and arithmetic.
